DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Collecting store sample blood patient cancer healthy participant test laboratory may help study cancer future . PURPOSE : This study collect store sample blood patient pancreatic cancer healthy participant .
DOC.brief_title: Collecting Storing Samples Blood From Patients With Pancreatic Cancer Healthy Participants
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Establish central pancreatic cancer specimen ( include serum peripheral blood lymphocyte ) repository serve resource current future scientific study . - Utilize clinical database perform clinicopathologic correlation result study . - Test new hypothesis emerge . OUTLINE : This prospective study . Blood collect patient pancreatic cancer baseline every 3-6 month 2 year . All participant blood collect baseline complete questionnaire baseline every 3-6 month 2 year . Serum peripheral blood lymphocyte obtain blood sample frozen store . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 200 patient 200 participant accrue study .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Meets 1 follow criterion : Histologically confirm pancreatic malignant neoplasm Serologically imageconfirmed diagnosis pancreatitis nonmalignant pancreatic disease Healthy , atrisk participant meeting follow criterion : Smoker , diabetic , and/or family history pancreatic cancer Healthy participant ( history cancer ) PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Not specify PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Not specify
